017package org.microbean.type;
018
019import java.lang.constant.Constable;
020import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
021import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
022import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
023
024import java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType;
025import java.lang.reflect.Type;
026
027import java.util.Arrays;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Objects;
030import java.util.Optional;
031
032import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
033
034import static org.microbean.type.ConstantDescs.CD_DefaultParameterizedType;
035import static org.microbean.type.ConstantDescs.CD_Type;
036
037/**
038 * A {@link ParameterizedType} implementation.
039 *
040 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
041 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
042 *
043 * @see ParameterizedType
044 */
045public final class DefaultParameterizedType implements Constable, ParameterizedType {
046
047
048  /*
049   * Instance fields.
050   */
051
052
053  private final Type ownerType;
054
055  private final Type rawType;
056
057  private final Type[] actualTypeArguments;
058
059  private final int hashCode;
060
061
062  /*
063   * Constructors.
064   */
065
066
067  /**
068   * Creates a new {@link DefaultParameterizedType}.
069   *
070   * @param ownerType the {@link Type} that owns this {@link
071   * DefaultParameterizedType}; may be (and usually is) {@code null}
072   *
073   * @param rawType the raw type; must not be {@code null}; is most
074   * commonly a {@link Class} as in all JDKs through at least 17 and
075   * as mandated currently by the Java Language Specification
076   *
077   * @param actualTypeArgument the actual {@linkplain
078   * #getActualTypeArguments() actual type argument} of this {@link
079   * DefaultParameterizedType}; must not be {@code null}
080   *
081   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code rawType} or {@code
082   * actualTypeArgument} is {@code null}
083   *
084   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code rawType} is an
085   * {@linkplain Class#isInstance(Object) instance of} {@link Class}
086   * and the length of the array returned by its {@link
087   * Class#getTypeParameters()} method is not {@code 1}
088   */
089  public DefaultParameterizedType(final Type ownerType, final Type rawType, final Type actualTypeArgument) {
090    super();
091    this.ownerType = ownerType;
092    this.rawType = Objects.requireNonNull(rawType, "rawType");
093    if (rawType instanceof Class<?> cls && cls.getTypeParameters().length != 1) {
094      throw new IllegalArgumentException("rawType: " + JavaTypes.toString(rawType) +
095                                         "; actualTypeArguments: " + JavaTypes.toString(actualTypeArgument));
096    }
097    this.actualTypeArguments = new Type[] { Objects.requireNonNull(actualTypeArgument, "actualTypeArgument") };
098    this.hashCode = this.computeHashCode();
099  }
100
101  /**
102   * Creates a new {@link DefaultParameterizedType}.
103   *
104   * @param ownerType the {@link Type} that owns this {@link
105   * DefaultParameterizedType}; may be (and usually is) {@code null}
106   *
107   * @param rawType the raw type; must not be {@code null}; is most
108   * commonly a {@link Class} as in all JDKs through at least 17 and
109   * as mandated currently by the Java Language Specification
110   *
111   * @param actualTypeArgument0 the first actual {@linkplain
112   * #getActualTypeArguments() actual type argument} of this {@link
113   * DefaultParameterizedType}; must not be {@code null}
114   *
115   * @param actualTypeArgument1 the second actual {@linkplain
116   * #getActualTypeArguments() actual type argument} of this {@link
117   * DefaultParameterizedType}; must not be {@code null}
118   *
119   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code rawType} or any type
120   * argument is {@code null}
121   *
122   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code rawType} is an
123   * {@linkplain Class#isInstance(Object) instance of} {@link Class}
124   * and the length of the array returned by its {@link
125   * Class#getTypeParameters()} method is not {@code 2}
126   */
127  public DefaultParameterizedType(final Type ownerType,
128                                  final Type rawType,
129                                  final Type actualTypeArgument0,
130                                  final Type actualTypeArgument1) {
131    super();
132    this.ownerType = ownerType;
133    this.rawType = Objects.requireNonNull(rawType, "rawType");
134    if (rawType instanceof Class<?> cls && cls.getTypeParameters().length != 2) {
135      throw new IllegalArgumentException("rawType: " + JavaTypes.toString(rawType) +
136                                         "; actualTypeArguments: " + List.of(actualTypeArgument0, actualTypeArgument1));
137    }
138    this.actualTypeArguments = new Type[] {
139      Objects.requireNonNull(actualTypeArgument0, "actualTypeArgument0"),
140      Objects.requireNonNull(actualTypeArgument1, "actualTypeArgument1")
141    };
142    this.hashCode = this.computeHashCode();
143  }
144
145  /**
146   * Creates a new {@link DefaultParameterizedType}.
147   *
148   * @param ownerType the {@link Type} that owns this {@link
149   * DefaultParameterizedType}; may be (and usually is) {@code null}
150   *
151   * @param rawType the raw type; must not be {@code null}; is most
152   * commonly a {@link Class} as in all JDKs through at least 17 and
153   * as mandated currently by the Java Language Specification
154   *
155   * @param actualTypeArguments the actual {@linkplain
156   * #getActualTypeArguments() actual type arguments} of this {@link
157   * DefaultParameterizedType}; may be {@code null} in which case a
158   * zero-length array will be used instead; will be cloned if
159   * non-{@code null} and if its length is greater than {@code 0}
160   *
161   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code rawType} is {@code
162   * null}
163   *
164   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code rawType} is an
165   * {@linkplain Class#isInstance(Object) instance of} {@link Class}
166   * and the length of the array returned by its {@link
167   * Class#getTypeParameters()} method is not the same as the length
168   * of the {@link actualTypeArguments} array (or {@code 0} if the
169   * {@code actualTypeArguments} array is {@code null})
170   */
171
172  /**
173   * Creates a new {@link DefaultParameterizedType}.
174   *
175   * @param ownerType the {@link Type} that owns this {@link
176   * DefaultParameterizedType}; may be (and usually is) {@code null}
177   *
178   * @param rawType the raw type; must not be {@code null}; is most
179   * commonly a {@link Class} as in all JDKs through at least 17 and
180   * as mandated currently by the Java Language Specification
181   *
182   * @param actualTypeArgument0 the first actual {@linkplain
183   * #getActualTypeArguments() actual type argument} of this {@link
184   * DefaultParameterizedType}; must not be {@code null}
185   *
186   * @param actualTypeArgument1 the second actual {@linkplain
187   * #getActualTypeArguments() actual type argument} of this {@link
188   * DefaultParameterizedType}; must not be {@code null}
189   *
190   * @param actualTypeArgument2 the third actual {@linkplain
191   * #getActualTypeArguments() actual type argument} of this {@link
192   * DefaultParameterizedType}; must not be {@code null}
193   *
194   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code rawType} or any type
195   * argument is {@code null}
196   *
197   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code rawType} is an
198   * {@linkplain Class#isInstance(Object) instance of} {@link Class}
199   * and the length of the array returned by its {@link
200   * Class#getTypeParameters()} method is not {@code 3}
201   */
202  public DefaultParameterizedType(final Type ownerType,
203                                  final Type rawType,
204                                  final Type actualTypeArgument0,
205                                  final Type actualTypeArgument1,
206                                  final Type actualTypeArgument2) {
207    
208    super();
209    this.ownerType = ownerType;
210    this.rawType = Objects.requireNonNull(rawType, "rawType");
211    if (rawType instanceof Class<?> cls && cls.getTypeParameters().length != 3) {
212      throw new IllegalArgumentException("rawType: " + JavaTypes.toString(rawType) +
213                                         "; actualTypeArguments: " +
214                                         List.of(actualTypeArgument0, actualTypeArgument1, actualTypeArgument2));
215    }
216    this.actualTypeArguments = new Type[] {
217      Objects.requireNonNull(actualTypeArgument0, "actualTypeArgument0"),
218      Objects.requireNonNull(actualTypeArgument1, "actualTypeArgument1"),
219      Objects.requireNonNull(actualTypeArgument2, "actualTypeArgument2")
220    };
221    this.hashCode = this.computeHashCode();
222  }
223  
224  /**
225   * Creates a new {@link DefaultParameterizedType}.
226   *
227   * @param ownerType the {@link Type} that owns this {@link
228   * DefaultParameterizedType}; may be (and usually is) {@code null}
229   *
230   * @param rawType the raw type; must not be {@code null}; is most
231   * commonly a {@link Class} as in all JDKs through at least 17 and
232   * as mandated currently by the Java Language Specification
233   *
234   * @param actualTypeArguments the actual {@linkplain
235   * #getActualTypeArguments() actual type arguments} of this {@link
236   * DefaultParameterizedType}; may be {@code null} in which case a
237   * zero-length array will be used instead; will be cloned if
238   * non-{@code null} and if its length is greater than {@code 0}
239   *
240   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code rawType} is {@code
241   * null}
242   *
243   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if {@code rawType} is an
244   * {@linkplain Class#isInstance(Object) instance of} {@link Class}
245   * and the length of the array returned by its {@link
246   * Class#getTypeParameters()} method is not the same as the length
247   * of the {@link actualTypeArguments} array (or {@code 0} if the
248   * {@code actualTypeArguments} array is {@code null})
249   */
250  public DefaultParameterizedType(final Type ownerType, final Type rawType, final Type... actualTypeArguments) {
251    super();
252    this.ownerType = ownerType;
253    this.rawType = Objects.requireNonNull(rawType, "rawType");
254    if (actualTypeArguments == null || actualTypeArguments.length <= 0) {
255      this.actualTypeArguments = JavaTypes.emptyTypeArray();
256    } else {
257      this.actualTypeArguments = actualTypeArguments.clone();
258    }
259    if (rawType instanceof Class<?> cls) {
260      final Type[] typeParameters = cls.getTypeParameters();
261      if (typeParameters.length != this.actualTypeArguments.length) {
262        throw new IllegalArgumentException("rawType: " + JavaTypes.toString(rawType) +
263                                           "; actualTypeArguments: " + Arrays.asList(actualTypeArguments));
264      }
265    }
266    this.hashCode = this.computeHashCode();
267  }
268
269  /**
270   * Creates a new {@link DefaultParameterizedType}.
271   *
272   * @param other the {@link ParameterizedType} to copy information
273   * from; must not be {@code null}
274   *
275   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code other} is {@code null}
276   *
277   * @see #DefaultParameterizedType(Type, Type, Type...)
278   */
279  public DefaultParameterizedType(final ParameterizedType other) {
280    this(other.getOwnerType(), other.getRawType(), other.getActualTypeArguments());
281  }
282
283
284  /*
285   * Instance methods.
286   */
287
288
289  @Override
290  public final Type getOwnerType() {
291    return this.ownerType;
292  }
293
294  @Override
295  public final Type getRawType() {
296    return this.rawType;
297  }
298
299  @Override
300  public final Type[] getActualTypeArguments() {
301    return this.actualTypeArguments.clone();
302  }
303
304  @Override
305  public final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
306    final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> ownerType = JavaTypes.describeConstable(this.getOwnerType());
307    if (ownerType.isPresent()) {
308      final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> rawType = JavaTypes.describeConstable(this.getRawType());
309      if (rawType.isPresent()) {
310        final Type[] actualTypeArguments = this.getActualTypeArguments();
311        final int bsmInvokeArgumentsLength = actualTypeArguments.length + 3;
312        final ConstantDesc[] bsmInvokeArguments = new ConstantDesc[bsmInvokeArgumentsLength];
313        bsmInvokeArguments[0] =
314          MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(CD_DefaultParameterizedType,
315                                         CD_Type,
316                                         CD_Type,
317                                         CD_Type.arrayType());
318        bsmInvokeArguments[1] = ownerType.orElseThrow();
319        bsmInvokeArguments[2] = rawType.orElseThrow();
320        for (int i = 3; i < bsmInvokeArgumentsLength; i++) {
321          final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> arg = JavaTypes.describeConstable(actualTypeArguments[i - 3]);
322          if (arg.isEmpty()) {
323            return Optional.empty();
324          }
325          bsmInvokeArguments[i] = arg.orElseThrow();
326        }
327        return Optional.of(DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE, bsmInvokeArguments));
328      }
329    }
330    return Optional.empty();
331  }
332  
333  @Override
334  public final int hashCode() {
335    return this.hashCode;
336  }
337
338  private final int computeHashCode() {
339    return JavaTypes.hashCode(this);
340  }
341
342  @Override
343  public final boolean equals(final Object other) {
344    if (other == this) {
345      return true;
346    } else if (other instanceof ParameterizedType p) {
347      return JavaTypes.equals(this, p);
348    } else {
349      return false;
350    }
351  }
352
353  @Override
354  public final String toString() {
355    return JavaTypes.toString(this);
356  }
357
358
359  /*
360   * Static methods.
361   */
362
363
364  /**
365   * If the supplied {@link ParameterizedType} is a {@link
366   * DefaultParameterizedType}, returns it; otherwise creates a new
367   * {@link DefaultParameterizedType} with the supplied {@link
368   * ParameterizedType}'s {@linkplain ParameterizedType#getOwnerType()
369   * owner type}, {@linkplain ParameterizedType#getRawType() raw type}
370   * and {@linkplain ParameterizedType#getActualTypeArguments() type
371   * arguments} and returns it.
372   *
373   * @param parameterizedType the {@link ParameterizedType} to
374   * effectively copy (or return); must not be {@code null}
375   *
376   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link DefaultParameterizedType}
377   *
378   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code parameterizedType} is
379   * {@code null}
380   *
381   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
382   *
383   * @idempotency This method is idempotent but not deterministic (in
384   * that it may return a new {@link DefaultParameterizedType} with
385   * each invocation).
386   *
387   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
388   * threads.
389   */
390  public static final DefaultParameterizedType of(final ParameterizedType parameterizedType) {
391    if (parameterizedType instanceof DefaultParameterizedType p) {
392      return p;
393    } else {
394      return new DefaultParameterizedType(parameterizedType);
395    }
396  }
397
398
399}
